response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we believe it could be even more beneficial in your hands. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects not only the product's worth but also the opportunity for mutual benefit. We trust that you will find its value exceeds our asking price and appreciate the unique benefits it can bring to you. We look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
